title: Circle Line service disruption due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 环线因轨道故障服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan Circle Line akibat kerosakan landasan
title_translations.ta: சுற்றுப்பாதை ரயில் சேவை தடங்கல் பாதை பழுது காரணமாக

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train services from #BotanicGardens towards #Caldecott are now operating normally.
[CCL]: Estimate 5 mins additional travelling time from #BotanicGardens to #Caldecott towards DhobyGhaut due to track fault.
